column4: hi people, which linux distro best for offical using with 90 client ? for stable and good management with PFSENSE firewall ? i am looking for linux versions which one i will install. this office will be open in august first week... this is an hospital.. and hospital program is web based and i only need firefox... this is why i will use linux and we will not spend stupid moneys for licenses, whats your suggest to use ? ubuntu ? suse ? fedora ? slackware ? thank
if everything is web based.. then it really dosent matter.   You could use a live cd setup.
most business would go the Ubuntu LTS route.
